title: Urban Square: Kouhaku no Tsuigeki
alternative_title: アーバンスクウェア　琥珀の追撃
description: Ryou Matsumoto is a screenplay writer that runs into a man and witnesses his murder. Unknown to him, he gets caught up in an illegal antique ring along with a girl he meets named Yuki. In order to survive, he ends up acting out the "action hero" role that he writes in his screenplays.
